sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField = Class.create();
CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField.prototype = {

    FEATURE: 'feature',

    initialize: function() {},

    process: function(tableName) {
        var fields = [];
        var td = new GlideRecord(tableName);

        if (td.isValid())
            for (var el in td.getElements())
                if (el.getColumnName().startsWith(this.FEATURE))
                    fields.push(el.getColumnName());

        return fields;
    },

    type: 'CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-01-15 21:51:03</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8a0a416cc3f1201099b86a764440dde0</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CMDBDynamicIREFeatureSetTableField</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">8f64bce83c31311068bcf327dfe37f7e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8a0a416cc3f1201099b86a764440dde0</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-07-27 20:53:46</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
